GATE Developer/Embedded Version 8.0 release (May 2014)

GATE Developer/Embedded 8.0 introduces

  • new tools for Twitter data, including the TwitIE named entity annotation pipeline
  • tools to support the creation of manually-annotated corpora using crowd sourcing
  • a refreshed and updated ANNIE, with improved performance
  • new plugins wrapping various third-party annotation services, and a host of improvements and bug-fixes to many existing plugins.

Full details can be found in the changelog in the user guide.

The GATE Developer/Embedded package can be downloaded from http://gate.ac.uk/download/.
